title: Cinesound Review
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1. National tennis titles - Lew Hoad and Ken Rosewall play doubles against Ron Candy and Mervyn Rose. Ken Rosewall meets Mervyn Rose again in a singles match. 2. A dog that talks - screen story about talking and performing dogs. 3. Shipbuilding a 7,000 ton motor vessel ‘Boonaroo’ launched in Sydeney. 4. Anti-TB drive in schools. 5. Sydney’s Royal Show with a parade of champion livestock and general exhibits.
